review_data.title: Nice hotel with great location
review_data.content: This hotel is very nice and the location is fantastic. Very close to the train station in Zurich (less than a 5 minute walk) and right on the busiest shopping street in town. The only thing I found unsatisfactory is the cost for their breakfast....More

review_data.title: Immer ein Bier wert
review_data.content: Gute Drinks zu günstigen Preisen. Sehr unkompliziert, immer ein Besuch wert. Hat meistens genügend Platz, auch draussen kann ohne Gedränge...More

review_data.title: small but busy place, laid-back people - excellent
review_data.content: In the (sometimes) frenzy of Langstrasse, this place is a laid-back oasis. Staff is super friendly and welcoming, they have a good selection of booze, a rustic but clean interior and usually there is good music on.

review_data.title: Tolle Beiz!!!
review_data.content: gute Musik, guter Live-Act!! Gute Schnaps-Auswahl, gibt nicht überall so guten Tequila :-) Service ist top und die Gäste sympathisch,...More

review_data.title: Fantastic place
review_data.content: There should be more bars like this! Great music, people, and location!! Will be back soon... Thanks guys keep it going...
